title: Muscle
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Andreas Poulsson and Barry Lank
brief_description: Pat Feras, who is a social worker by profession, spends most of her leisure hours body building. This film shows Pat training for, and competing in, a women’s body building championship and includes fascinating footage, of the championship, both from backstage and upfront.
